item.title: ionic命令行Generate体验总结
item.description: ionic命令行Generate体验总结 工具简述 Description Ionic now provides a generator function to create pages and services for your app. This makes going from a basic app to a full featured app with navigation much easier. To create a page you can use the following command: # ionic g page <PageName>

item.title: ionicCreator实际体验与评测
item.description: ionicCreator实际体验与评测 免费版 目前只支持ionic 1.0 页面修改Routing URL，导出项目templates中page名未变化
